DOC.detailed_description: To determine efficacy bright white light exposure compare dim red light exposure reduce post-TBI fatigue , 8-week , randomized parallel-group clinical trial perform . After 4 week daily , 30-minute light treatment , baseline battery re-administered ( T2 ) along 3 day Actigraphy . A follow-up assessment involve measure administer 1 month-post cessation light therapy ( T3 ) . Participant treatment allocation mask research team member conduct outcome measure . Secondary outcome measure administer explore effect light therapy mood , daytime sleepiness , sleep quality , circadian rhythm , anxiety , cognition life satisfaction .
